name: Even Faster
description:
Even Faster

The sequel to God Speed.

A browser-based racing game where you must move left and right to avoid oncoming traffic.

Controls:

Up Arrow / W to go up 

Down Arrow / S to go down 

Left Arrow / A to go left

Right Arrow / D to go right

F1 to toggle Siren

F2 to toggle music

Please enable all cookies in your browser settings otherwise the game will not load
